programme.title: Sherry Anne
programme.desc: Khalif seorang anak muda yang sering menghabiskan masa dengan berseronok dan berfoya-foya bersama rakan-rakannya. Khalif juga tidak mempunyai pekerjaan tetap kerana sikapnya yang terlalu memilih kerja. Lantara sikap itulah yang membuatkan kedua-dua orang tuanya iaitu Pak Akob dan Mak Nah begitu kecewa dengan Khalif. Apatah lagi Pak Akob yang telah berusia tetapi masih lagi gigih bekerja untuk menyara keluarga mereka. Pak Akob bekerja sebagai seorang pemandu van jenazah dan dia amat disenangi oleh orang ramai. Dengan pekerjaan itulah dia menyara kehidupan keluarganya. Namun Khalif malu dengan pekerjaan bapanya itu. Selepas ayahnya meninggal dunia, barulah kesedaran mula timbul dalam dirinya kerana terpaksa menjalankan aktiviti bisnes ayahnya.

programme.desc: Arin dan Andra secara tidak sengaja menukar bagasi mereka di terminal! Ketika itulah kisah cinta mereka bermula.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep81
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep61
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Kiss Awards 2020 Ep2
programme.desc: Acara anugerah pertama di Indonesia yang diadakan selama 2 hari! Saksikan pemenang ''24 kategori Kiss'' untuk selebriti Indonesia yang mencipta pencapaian serta sensasi pada tahun 2020.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep45
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Bridesmaid Barbar Curi Perhatian Di Nikahan Orang
programme.desc: Pinky yang tomboi terpaksa berpakaian feminin untuk menjadi pengiring pengantin perempuan di majlis perkahwinan sepupunya, Bunga. Apa yang berlaku jika pengiring pengantin lebih cantik daripada pengantin perempuan? Itulah yang terjadi pada Pinky yang mencuri perhatian di majlis perkahwinan dan membuatkan Bagas terpesona dengan Pinky.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep29
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep31
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Malam Puncak HUT SCTV 32Xtraordinary Ep2
programme.desc: Menyambut Ulang Tahun ke-32! SCTV Xtraordinary menampilkan persembahan yang menakjubkan dengan kerjasama artis Indonesia yang lain.

programme.title: Bridesmaid Barbar Curi Perhatian Di Nikahan Orang
programme.desc: Pinky yang tomboi terpaksa berpakaian feminin untuk menjadi pengiring pengantin perempuan di majlis perkahwinan sepupunya, Bunga. Apa yang berlaku jika pengiring pengantin lebih cantik daripada pengantin perempuan? Itulah yang terjadi pada Pinky yang mencuri perhatian di majlis perkahwinan dan membuatkan Bagas terpesona dengan Pinky.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep45
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep1
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep30
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep32
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semakin Aku Menderita, Semakin Bahagia Suamiku
programme.desc: Ayah Listy tidak sengaja melanggar isteri Adam, Santy yang sedang mengandung. Namun selepas menangkap seseorang, Adam tahu siapa yang melanggar isteri kesayangannya. Dia mengekori orang yang melanggar isterinya dan rupa-rupanya orang itu mempunyai seorang anak perempuan, Listy. Adam yang masih berdendam, sengaja mendekati dan mengahwini Listy sebagai cara untuk membalas dendam kepada ayahnya.

programme.title: Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi
programme.desc: Nikmati keseronokan bersama dengan menyanyi dan bergoyang di Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi bersama barisan bintang terkenal dan hos yang mengujakan.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep20
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Habis Married Godaan Datang, Semoga Kuat Yagesyah
programme.desc: Rachel menganggap perjalanan perkahwinannya lancar seperti dalam kisah dongeng. Banyak godaan yang menimpa perkahwinan Rachel dan Nathan, menyebabkan mereka bergaduh dan salah faham antara satu sama lain, tetapi mampukah perkahwinan mereka bertahan?

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep59
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: The Sultan Ep31
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.desc: The gala revolves around the three chapters of Yue Yun Ying Chun, Yue Sheng Feng Chun, and Jin Qu Chan Chun, with gathered eight plum blossoms of Yue opera to recite the chapters. “The China Theatre Plum Blossom Award” winners are invited to perform the chapters and bring many classic selections of Yue opera.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Declaration of parents of one’s daughter-in-law or son-in-law would be kept in Season 4, to show the family culture in the shortest time. The show aims to encourage the communication between parents and children, and arouse the audience’s emotional resonance.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep46
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep1

programme.title: CNY-Super Ethnic Chinese(M) Ep1

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29132914
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep913914
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ Lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: CNY-Hot Door Night(M) Ep1
programme.desc: Jacky Wu will take the lead as main host, meanwhile Hank Chen and Lulu will assist to accomplish the missions that Jacky Wu were assigned. They are making surprises for their friends, specifically for this Chinese New Year. Let’s enjoy the unpredictable and the boom of laughter together with Hot Door Night.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3607
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ Lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: CNY Stylish Man-The Chef(M) Ep1
programme.desc: This time, hosts and artistes will divide into 2 teams and teamed up with 2 chefs each group. Each team need to use given ingredients and cook a special snack. Stay tuned for who will have the last laugh by becoming the winner in the end.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3608
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2555
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29142915
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep917918
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1987
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Like That Also Can (M) Ep7
programme.desc:
We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!
“Jiangplay” is an all new social media and reality show that our hosts experience, take on challenges by gathering trendie, old school, hippie and sub-cultures, creating unexpected fun and an all new impression on learning, giving you resonating inspiration and rush in each episode.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: This silver screen epic, a prequel to Infernal Affairs, hit the astonishing $16.8 million box office mark one week after its premiere. The second installment of the Infernal Affairs trilogy brings audiences with ultimate suspense and high quality action scenes! Turning into a Chinese version of the popular Godfather series, Infernal Affairs II offers its viewers an even tighter plot with a brilliant cast led by Edison Chen, Shawn Yue, Carina Lau, Eric Tsang, Anthony Wong, and Francis Ng to supply top entertainment that has rarely been seen in modern Hong Kong cinema. A legend is born at the best of times. From the multiple award-winning team behind the mind-blowing blockbuster, the secrets are finally revealed in this most anticipating prequel: What drove police superintendent Wong (Anthony Wong) and crime boss Sam (Eric Tsang) against one another? How did two struggling moles Yan (Shawn Yue) and Ming (Edison Chen) begin their parallel fates? The keys lie in the hands of three: Sam's wife Mary (Carina Lau), ruthless kingpin Hau (Francis Ng), and righteous cop Luk (Hu Jun). The infernal gates are open to the worst of times...

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In 2004, 10 months after the murder of Yan (Tony Leung Chiu-wai), Ming (Andy Lau) is transferred to do the office work. Meanwhile, a new star Wing (Leon Lai) has emerged in the police force. Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Three years ago, Yan's first big mission was to build up a smuggling network with Shen (Chen Dao-ming), a mysterious businessman from China. Actually, Yan's was out of control and he was forced to see psychologist Dr Lee (Kelly Chen), but he gradually developed a special friendship with her.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every client’s needs. When Ah Kam’s ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by “Drunken Master”, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang’s father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Ambitious Prince Four (Liu Yung) attempts to kill the potential heir Prince Fourteen (Mok Siu-chung), but the latter is rescued by his aide Tseng Tsing (Hsu Shao-chiang). After an unsuccessful attempt to buy Tseng Tsing, Prince Four tries to murder him, but fails. He eventually hires Nien Keng-yao (Pai Piao), an outstanding martial artist, as his aide.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: In Swift Sword, popular director Ho Meng-hua exposes a whole cast of established talent to create a searing martial arts extravaganza that reeks of steel-slashing bewitchment worthy of any swordplay epic.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun…

programme.title: Inji Iduppazhagi
programme.desc: Sweety, an obese woman, joins a slimming centre but is horrified to witness the effects of the medicines they prescribe. She starts a campaign to stress the importance of being fit rather than slim.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: Nerkonda Parvai
programme.desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Mannar Vageraya
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Veera loses his father in a village fight arising out of a long-standing rivalry. Can he avenge his father's death and put an end to the violence?

programme.title: Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal
programme.desc: Krishna, an IT professional, becomes suicidal after going through a bad break-up. When he goes missing, his friends search for him and run into a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Iru Mugan
programme.desc: Love creates a new drug called Speed which was used by Hitler during WW2 to transform humans into superhumans. Agillan lost his wife and quits his job as RAW Agent.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Kaadan
programme.desc: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs (3 Hrs)
programme.desc: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now his accomplices expect the return of the actual don.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Vakeel Saar
programme.desc: Three girls find themselves accused of attempt to murder after escaping molestation. Their only hope is an alcoholic lawyer who agrees to take up the case.

programme.title: V
programme.desc: A mystery man named V sets out to exact revenge for his wife's brutal murder. However, he must evade a police officer, who is determined to catch him.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Velakkara Durai
programme.desc: Murugan falls in love with Yamuna and with the help of his friend Paandi,he saves Yamuna from a marriage with a notorious money lender.

programme.title: Vetrivel
programme.desc: A brother attempts to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy situations.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.desc: There's only one thing keeping aspiring executive from corporate success. Find the perfect guest to bring to his boss's monthly dinner party where winner is the one who arrives with the biggest buffoon.

programme.desc: The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: A young couple (Ben Stiller and Drew Barrymore) have a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in a perfect New York neighbourhood. All they have to do is bump off a cute little old lady. (2003)

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must see family comedy from the creators of Daddy's Home.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: The Walking Dead - A Navy Lieutenant Commander in impeccable shape turns to Pride and the NCIS team to solve his imminent murder after discovering he has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation.

programme.title: The Great (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: A Pox on Hope - Catherine is feeling optimistic, until a smallpox breakout causes Peter to revert back to his old ways. Meanwhile, Leo and Catherine's relationship suffers and Georgina misses Peter.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Crossroads - A loving husband and father of two, Jim Russo (Claybourne Elder), is kidnapped after accidentally getting involved in illegal dealings far beyond what he imagined.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: DNA Episode 5
programme.desc: Investigations take a sinister turn when further investigations points Rolf to a monastery in Southern Poland. He soon realises that he’s possibly looking at a complex international child trafficking network, where religion is far from virtuous.

programme.title: DNA Episode 6
programme.desc: Rolf discovers that the monastery illegally supplies babies to an online organisation called “Bliss”. He travels to Paris to investigate a celebrity couple who he suspects have used “Bliss” and soon find revealing connections to his daughter and Minna’s cases.

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: My Father's Bike
programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: The Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Annabel seduces married men and blackmails them for cash. But what goes around comes around, and she ends up getting cheated by another con artist, Tom. When the perfect targets appear for both to win big, a war begins – but so does an unexpected love.

programme.title: The Carer (OTO)
programme.desc: Dorottya is a young theatre actress who’s elated when offered the job as caretaker for the legendary stage actor Sir Michael Gifford. That is, until she finds out he’s a grumpy and irascible old man. Yet, an unexpected friendship soon blossoms.

programme.title: Oranda
programme.desc: A workaholic father is confronted by his son after having carelessly caused the death of his son’s pet goldfish.

programme.title: To Live To Sing (OTO)
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: DNA Episode 5
programme.desc: Investigations take a sinister turn when further investigations points Rolf to a monastery in Southern Poland. He soon realises that he’s possibly looking at a complex international child trafficking network, where religion is far from virtuous.

programme.title: DNA Episode 6
programme.desc: Rolf discovers that the monastery illegally supplies babies to an online organisation called “Bliss”. He travels to Paris to investigate a celebrity couple who he suspects have used “Bliss” and soon find revealing connections to his daughter and Minna’s cases.

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: My Father's Bike
programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: Oranda
programme.desc: A workaholic father is confronted by his son after having carelessly caused the death of his son’s pet goldfish.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: DNA Episode 7
programme.desc: Further clues bring Rolf and his team to Denmark where they investigate a seemingly respectable pair of foster parents. They discover a murky undercurrent of illegal child trafficking activities that connects them back to a mole in their own police team.

programme.title: DNA Episode 8
programme.desc: With the international child trafficking ring exposed, the Minna case is finally solved. However, Rolf’s mission isn’t complete - he painstakingly continues to search for his daughter and finds himself on a circular path that’s linked to Minna’s case.

programme.title: The Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Annabel seduces married men and blackmails them for cash. But what goes around comes around, and she ends up getting cheated by another con artist, Tom. When the perfect targets appear for both to win big, a war begins – but so does an unexpected love.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Bellbird
programme.desc: In this tender film on masculine grief and rural life, Ross is a small town dairy farmer who loses his spirit to live after the sudden death of his wife. As the seasons pass, he learns to connect with his own sense of loss and lean on those around him.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Veins Of The World (OTO)
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss

programme.title: Irina
programme.desc: Stuck in poverty and desperate to make ends meet, Irina decides to become a surrogate mother. As the baby grows inside her, she must accept that she will have to part with it forever, and she discovers what it means to love and forgive.

programme.title: Bellbird
programme.desc: In this tender film on masculine grief and rural life, Ross is a small town dairy farmer who loses his spirit to live after the sudden death of his wife. As the seasons pass, he learns to connect with his own sense of loss and lean on those around him.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Two commissioners, Hannah Zeiler and Micha Oberländer, investigate a traditional bride kidnapping-turned-brutal murder. As the investigation unfolds, the commissioners uncover an old family tragedy.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: Machine Hearts
programme.desc: It is the year 2065, and robots and automation have threatened to replace all remaining jobs. However, Edwin the mechanic, refuses to accept this state of things.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 2
programme.desc: Thony attempts to sever ties with the crime syndicate when the FBI comes asking questions, but when her son’s health declines, she crosses a moral line, getting deeper involved.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 10
programme.desc: Obsessed with getting his powers back, Constantine (MATT RYAN) and Spooner go on a quest to find the Fountain of Imperium and find themselves at the end of the Spanish Civil War.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 01
programme.desc: What did she say? Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) answers Sheldon's marriage proposal in the eleventh season premiere. Meanwhile, Howard & Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers--and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Kung Fu S2 9
programme.desc: After uncovering an item that Russell Tan is after, Nicky enlists her entire family to help infiltrate the Enclave, a secret gathering of the world’s elite.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr and Sal get themselves into some hairy predicaments at the beauty supply store. Then, they discover that a language barrier adds to the awkwardness during a text message challenge in Time's Square. And later, a panel of esteemed educators offers no help to tonight's stammering loser.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 4
programme.desc: The mother lode of all containers makes landfall. Jason and Matt go all in, but will their hunches pay off? Or will beauty queen Deana's fashion sense reel in the ultimate score? A surprise twist could change every rule in the book.

programme.title: Arrow S1 10
programme.desc: After being beaten by the Dark Archer, Oliver hangs up his hood. When Laurel calls Arrow for help, however, he reluctantly agrees... but his hesitation almost costs him his life.

programme.title: The Flash S7 9
programme.desc: After a devastating betrayal, Barry turns to Timeless Wells for help. Meanwhile, Iris leads Team Citizen down a dangerous road in search of answers, and Cisco confides his biggest fear to Kamilla.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 01
programme.desc: What did she say? Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) answers Sheldon's marriage proposal in the eleventh season premiere. Meanwhile, Howard & Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.desc: Following an emotional reunion with her mother, Veronica is hired to track down Neptune High's beloved mascot, Polly the Parrot, which was apparently kidnapped by a rival school on the eve of a big basketball game. Meanwhile, with her suspicions about the Kane family rekindled, Veronica attempts to gain access to her father's original interrogation tapes. Later, Veronica's relationship with Deputy Leo (recurring guest star MAX GREENFIELD) intensifies, as does Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) relationship with Duncan.

programme.title: Gotham S1 4
programme.desc: Gordon and Bullock must protect the City Council as a contentious Council vote on the future of the Arkham District approaches and politicians on both sides are in danger.

programme.desc: Iris is pushed to the limit as she seeks to uncover the mysterious truth about Psych. Meanwhile, Barry initiates a new training system that could potentially backfire, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 17
programme.desc: As she continues investigating Lilly Kane's murder, Veronica pursues a risky lead that could discredit Abel Koontz's (not appearing in this episode) confession when she discovers that the convicted killer has a daughter, Amelia DeLongpre (ERIN CHAMBERS), who is about to receive a huge payoff from Jake Kane (recurring guest star KYLE SECOR). Logan stumbles onto Veronica's detailed computer files of everyone connected to Lilly's death. At school, Veronica is hired by a senior student, Sabrina(MEGAN HENNING), to find the party responsible for tormenting her in an attempt to sabotage Sabrina's chances at becoming valedictorian. Sabrina is not well liked by most of her peers, and the long list of suspects includes her ex-boyfriend and herclosest competitor. Meanwhile, unsavory, rival private investigator Vinnie Vanlowe (KEN MARINO) makes Keith a business offer.

programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep1
programme.desc: Inauguration - Picking up one year after the events of the final episode of "The Good Wife," an enormous financial scam has destroyed the reputation of a young lawyer, Maia Rindell, while simultaneously wiping out her mentor and godmother Diane Lockhart's savings. Forced out of Lockhart & Lee, they join Lucca Quinn at one of Chicago's preeminent law firms.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep2
programme.desc: First Week - Diane raises eyebrows while settling in as a new partner at Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad. Maia continues to deal with the repercussions of her family's Ponzi scheme. Lucca and Maia unexpectedly pick up a new case.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep73
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: The Mask Of Zorro
programme.desc: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers get a brutal education when a mission gone awry results in the U.S. military's single biggest firefight since Vietnam.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Detectives Christopher Danson and P.K. Highsmith are the most beloved cops in New York City. Two desks over and one back, sit Detectives Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz. You've seen them in the background of photos, out of focus and eyes closed. They're not heroes – they're "the Other Guys."

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the people of China from January to April as the Chinese concept of 24 solar terms is explained. After Chinese New Year we witness a stunning Lantern Festival in Nanjing.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As the mid-autumn festival brings families together, and September turns into October, we find out how autumn rains make life difficult for engineers building a huge dam out of concrete.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Land of The Panda - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.desc: This episode looks at how chocolate chips, Bombay mix, pickle slices and mushroom soup are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep24
programme.desc: This episode looks at how squeezable yoghurt tubes, tomato sauce, fruity chews and tempeh are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Colourful Planet - From space Earth is a kaleidoscope. Turquoise plankton blooms trigger a feeding frenzy, China turns yellow with rapeseed flowers, and mysterious green lights appear in the ocean.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bangkok to Hua Hin - Michael continues his exploration of Thailand by rail, steered by his 1913 Bradshaw's guide. First, he steps into the ring under the guidance of champion trainer, Master Toddy, to learn Muay Thai boxing. Can he perfect the Cobra inspired right hook?

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: We visit an extraordinary bridge that spans a vast valley and becomes the tallest in the world, and a luxury hotel was built upside down in an abandoned quarry in China.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - The Predator's Plight Ep1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Living with Sharks Ep3

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.
